title: Spigen launches crazy new luxury Italian leather and diamond-cut metal MagSafe iPhone 13 case
content:
Spigen is officially launching its new premium Italian leather iPhone 13 case today. The brand is well known around here for its affordable that generally hit above their pay grade – its Mag Armor case landed in our Best iPhone 13 cases of the year 2021 Edition feature, but the brand is looking in an entirely new direction with today’s reveal of the “luxury without compromise” ENZO iPhone 13 case. Head below for more details. 

more…

The post Spigen launches crazy new luxury Italian leather and diamond-cut metal MagSafe iPhone 13 case appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Spigen is officially launching its new premium Italian leather iPhone 13 case today, but the diamond-cut metal is going to cost you.
